subheader1-2: Holipic App is an multi-channel photo kiosk for stores and chains that allows to sell photos privately in-store and online.
manage-subtitle: Holipic App Dashboard is where you fully manage your stores. It is intuitive, easy to use and provides you with a ton of features to costumize your store exactly the way you want with real time operations.
manage-li-1: Check online your company sales and quality of works.
manage-li-2: Compare sales daily, weekly, monthly or yearly.
manage-li-4: Manage easily all your products, customer and orders.
increase-subtitle: Holipic App is online software which is automates the process of accepting photo order for your bussiness. You can gain selling benefits from this software like:
increase-li-1: The Holipic App will send promotional emails to increase sells.
increase-li-2: Continue to sale photos, even after customers back to home.
increase-li-3: Leave work to computers, make your staff busy in other important things.
increase-li-4: Accept orders much faster and reduce mistake caused by human factors.
secure-subtitle: The Holipic App are fully integrated to provide consumers with this type of a secured experience for photo ordering and storage, regardless of channel or device.
secure-li-2: Online storing data will reduce the risk of losing photos.
secure-li-3: Created private pages for your every customer.
secure-li-5: Limited access for branches, full access for owners.
register-subtitle-1: We offer a secure digital goods e-commerce service to anyone to sell easily photos and images.
register-subtitle-2: Get started selling photos on Holipic App in just a few minutes using our simple links anywhere you like.
register-li-1: Select a suitable package: Basic or Pro.
register-li-2: Sign Up: Click register and complete the company data.
register-li-3: Sign In: Use your email and password to login.
setup-subtitle: Holipic App makes it easy to manage multiple stores from the same account. You ca add as many stores, photographers as you wish, each with its own access.
setup-li-2: Setup your branches, team, packages and products easily.
setup-li-3: Deliver login links to the branch admin, team to start.
selling-subtitle: Holipic App automates the photos order and even order fulfillment process. Leave monotonous works to computers, Your customers will be much happier with your quality service.
selling-li-1: Upload the Photos to the your admin
selling-li-2: Show photos on the eye-catching designed selling app.
selling-li-3: Offer to your customers rest of photos for online purchase.
pricing-subtitle-1: The Holipic Online Selling systems are completely free to use and there is no charge until you make a sale.
pricing-subtitle-2: We'll only earn when you earn.
pricing-subtitle-3: Your online sales are automatically loaded into an e-wallet, which is supporting your system fee not paying from your pocket, which means Holipic App can earn self-payment by promoting and selling your photos.
pricing-subtitle-4: Get started now by select suitable packages.
modal-sublogo: Start fully manage your customer, incomes, staff and Improving sales by registration your company.
